price: 7. Kaadu konoyhaytó sumaaqah, diggah dalwak teetil haamal dirableelâ num ekkek Yalli isi Racmatak yoo yayxaaray axcuk xiibitaama.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةُ أَنَّ لَعۡنَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
